name: casdk
description: Write and deploy applications for the Mazda Infotainment System
author: flyandi <flyandi@yahoo.com>

scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./src/ide "Mazda Custom Application IDE" --out=dist/ide/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.7 --icon=src/assets/osx/icon.icns
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager ./src/ide "Mazda Custom Application IDE" --out=dist/ide/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.7 --icon=src/assets/win/icon.ico
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run pack:osx && electron-builder "dist/ide/osx/Mazda Custom Application IDE.app" --platform=osx --out="dist/ide/osx" --config=builder.json
scripts.build:win: npm run pack:win && electron-builder "dist/ide/win/Mazda Custom Application IDE-win32" --platform=win --out="dist/ide/win" --config=builder.json
